body_html:
@carpodaster Misunderstanding: you can configure Google Sheets to export to .tsv, you just can not set export settings within the chosen format. So, we tell it to use tab separators by telling to export to .tsv
AFAIK in .tsv, we don't care about the quotation marks, because it will never interprets Aug 17, 2017 as two columns.
I added a tsv test file to PR #798.
How about the YOLO way: merge the PR and let Maria test in production? Nobody else is using the feature anyway.
EDIT: or can you merge it into staging and not in master?

@mkalininait We are not exporting .tsv, we are importing it.
